title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Strategies to Enhance Cognitive Presence in Online and Face-to-Face Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Project-based learning experience and foundational expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of systematic instructional design—from project planning to evaluation—on cognitive presence.
Learners improve their critical thinking skills by over 30% through real-time feedback and facilitated discussions.

Learners can develop three or more collaboration strategies using instructor presence elements (design, direct guidance, discussion facilitation) in online/face-to-face environments, apply them to real-world scenarios, and validate feasibility through peer evaluation and a checklist (meeting at least 4 out of 5 criteria).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
